text: Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui (, ; ) is an Indian love comedy movie. It first came out on 10 December 2021 and can now be watched on Netflix. The movie was directed by Abhishek Kapoor, and it stars Ayushmann Khurrana and Vaani Kapoor. This movie is about a love couple, and the groom learns that the bride he is dating with is transgender. At first, he gets mad at her, but later in the movie he begins learning about transgender women and toward the end of the movie he understands her. The two later accepted to be with each other. Both actors got good praise for their performances. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui at Bollywood Hungama Category:2020s Hindi-language movies Category:2020s Indian movies Category:2020s LGBT movies
title: Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui
